title: RIOT! FIX THE DOWNLOAD LINK
body:
Uhg. I kept getting the Unspecified Error: Please check logs so I uninstalled. I come back to reinstall AND THE LINK ISNT WORKING. 

Im using MAC.

replies.body: Wait, "Google Chrome could not find", does that usually come up when you type in a phony address?

Yes exactly, thing is. The link is the actual downloadlink from this very website so im wondering why its coming up as a phony link when it comes from the official website.

It keeps reccomending riotgames.com but it isnt even an actual link...

So, when you attempt to download the installer from either a Mac computer or a Windows computer using Chrome, it brings you to a false web address.

How queer.

Okay, so I just tried it on Safari. The link actually worked this time.

Lets just hope it actually opens this time because that was the problem I originally had.
It's been twenty minutes. Do tell of the results.

No luck. Tried to re install, No luck either. and this time the download link is not working on Google chrome OR safari.


RIOT PLEASE ITS BEEN AGES I WANT TO PLAY

Oh damn, that sucks. It stopped working on Safari too.

Like, what is with that?
hear hear, I'm using windows 7, same problem.
Ive been seeing you and your cute little virus links, Id rather not click on that.
